item.title: Dato' Joey Yap reveals video predictions for each Chinese zodiac animal for the year 2017
item.description:
Joey Yap, founder and CEO of the Mastery Academy of Chinese Metaphysics and Chief Consultant of the Joey Yap Consulting Group, created 12 videos outlining the year ahead for the 12 Chinese zodiac animal signs in areas such as career, relationships, business, and health. The videos are in English and include traditional Chinese subtitles. The year of the fire rooster starts on January 28, 2017. Yap considers the rooster one of the luckiest animals in 2017...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dato-joey-yap-reveals-video-predictions-for-each-chinese-zodiac-animal-for-the-year-2017/

item.title: Add some festive flowers to the office to celebrate Chinese New Year and bring some brightness
item.description:
Starting January 19, 2015, Viva La Fleur will debut a new collection of long-lasting bouquets and table arrangements. The color palette for this collection features predominantly red, orange, and yellow tones, symbolizing love, luck, and fortune, perfectly aligning with the festive season. This arrangement, part of Viva La Fleur’s new collection, showcases deep red roses, hydrangeas, and caspia accented with brown twigs. You can find this arrangement in Viva La Fleur’s online shop here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/add-some-festive-flowers-to-the-office-to-celebrate-chinese-new-year-and-bring-some-brightness/

item.title: Joey Yap provides predictions for the 12 animal signs in the year 2018
item.description:
Source: Joey Yap Private Limited. Infographic for the 12 animal signs in 2018. Chinese culture places significance on the lunar year, believing it brings new fortunes. Each of the 12 animal signs in the Chinese zodiac is thought to face unique opportunities and obstacles. Within the Chinese zodiac, each year aligns with one of 12 animals and one of five elements. Although the year of the fire rooster (January 28, 2017, to February 15, 2018) is still ongoing, a shift is anticipated on February 16, 2018, as the year of the earth dog commences...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/joey-yap-provides-predictions-for-the-12-animal-signs-in-the-year-2018/
